segments.text: I am observing a typical kitchen scene, though something is amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is diligently polishing a plate, completely engrossed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the faucet is running freely, filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is now cascading over the edge, pouring onto the cabinet fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a widening puddle on the floor where her foot is already submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains perfectly calm, a testament to her concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to spread, threatening to ruin the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the damage this will cause to the beautiful wooden cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of the steady stream just keeps flowing, unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how oblivious one can be when focused on a task.
segments.speaker: PAR
